sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RYNCHOPS in ornithology, a genus belonging to the order of anſeres. The bill is ſtraight ; and the ſuperior mandible much ſhorter than the inferior, which is truncated at the po⅛t. The ſpecies are two, viz. the nigra and fulva, both natives of America.
